scripts.release:minor: VERSION=$(npm version minor -m 'Bump version to %s') && VERSION=$(echo $VERSION | cut -c 2- | rev | cut -c 3- | rev) && git checkout -b release-$VERSION
scripts.release:major: VERSION=$(npm version major -m 'Bump version to %s') && VERSION=$(echo $VERSION | cut -c 2- | rev | cut -c 3- | rev) && git checkout -b release-$VERSION
